title: Turkey Bolognese Sauce
ingredients: ['1 kg minced turkey', '2 onions, minced', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '2 carrots, finely diced or grated', '1 1/2 teaspoons dried basil', '1 birds-eye chilli pepper (optional)', '250ml milk', '355ml white wine', '3 or 4 (400g) tins whole peeled tomatoes', '1 tablespoon tomato puree', '450g spaghetti or penne pasta', '40g Parmesan cheese, grated']
